name: Special Green Tea
description: Add ice cream into the Hot Green Tea. You will only taste the flavor of thick cream left in the tea. Drink it and you will recover 20% Max SP, and can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Specialty Jur
description: The Katars with plenty of inserting holes can be quite heavy and can sometimes hurt the user.

name: Specialty Jur [2]
description: The blade that increases the number of holes, it may hurt you due to its great power, with a small probability to case yourself to lose HP.

name: Spectral Spear [3]
description: In order to hunt monsters, the maker sacrificed his life to create the powerful double-handed pistol which hence has consciousness and tends to dominate the user.

name: Spectral Spear[2]
description: In order to hunt monsters, the maker sacrificed his life to create the powerful double-handed pistol which hence has consciousness and tends to dominate the user.

name: Speed Cake
description: The cake with cream that increases speed in a short period. Eating this cake increases player's moving speed by 100% within 10 seconds, CD lasts 1 minute, This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Sphinx Hat
description: Hat from a distant country. It symbolizes the highest power of sun, and is harder than your imagination.

name: Sphinx Hat [1]
description: Hat from a distant country. It symbolizes the highest power of sun, and is harder than your imagination.

name: Sphinx Hat [1] Blueprint
description: Hat from a distant country. It symbolizes the highest power of sun, and is harder than your imagination.

name: Spicy Chips
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. VIT ＋ 10, MaxHP ＋ 1000, effect lasts 30 minutes. (Can't be stacked with VIT Food)

name: Spiked Scarf
description: The masks with iron nails are mostly loved by the frenzied ones.

name: Spiked Scarf Blueprint
description: The masks with iron nails are mostly loved by the frenzied ones.

name: Spiky Band
description: Headdress with sharp horns on it.

name: Spiky Band Blueprint
description: Headdress with sharp horns on it.

name: Spiky Band [1]
description: Headdress with sharp horns on it.

name: Spirit Katar [2]
description: A Katars designed for quick attacks.

name: Spirit Katar [3]
description: A Katars designed for quick attacks.
